title: Devin January '25 Product Update (Devin 1.2)
description: Major improvements to Devin's ability to reason in context within a repository, better at finding relevant files and reusing existing code patterns. Introduced voice messages via Slack, enterprise account management with centralized billing, usage-based billing starting January 9th, and Docker performance improvements with 'Large Performant (Beta)' VM infra.

community_feedback.quote: With Cursor I could shop around between different models... Claude Code has steep competition against Windsurf and Cursor

title: Copilot Workspace Updates (January 6th, 2025)
description: Added ability to add new files directly from file tree without modifying the plan, error toggling to hide errors when not actively working, improved codespace creation with automatic region selection for reduced latency, and accessibility improvements including screen reader announcements for applied suggestions.

title: Model Deprecations and Platform Updates
description: Announced deprecation of Claude 2, Claude 2.1, and Claude Sonnet 3 models on January 21, 2025. Updated prompt caching on January 15, 2025 to automatically read from the longest previously cached prefix, and improved the 'put words in Claude's mouth' feature when using tools.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code is just better sadly. I like the UI of cursor better but alas.
Claude Code has steep competition against Windsurf and Cursor

title: Changelist: January 2025
description: Codeium/Windsurf introduced a host of new features, performance upgrades, and fixes in January 2025. Wave 14 brought Arena Mode for side-by-side model comparison and Plan Mode features. JetBrains plugin version 1.36 included performance improvements on large repositories and indexing boosts.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code has steep competition against Windsurf and Cursor
Windsurf noted to have simpler answers with more errors compared to Cursor when tested with Claude Sonnet model

title: Gemini API January 2025 Updates
description: Google Gen AI SDK for Python reached general availability on January 21, 2025. Model updates included gemini-2.0-flash-thinking-exp. VS Code Gemini Code Assist integration improvements announced on January 30, 2025 for Google Cloud project settings.

title: OpenAI Codex CLI Security and Model Updates
description: January 2025 saw model release notes for GPT-4o in ChatGPT (January 29) and GPT-4o with scheduled tasks (January 14). CLI v0.89.0 introduced 'What's New' notification feature that displays when the CLI runs for the first time after an update.
